fieldUpdates.description: CE - CMA Stage to AEM Input
fieldUpdates.name: CE - CMA Stage to AEM Input
CE - Stage set to Training Completed

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Date_of_Event_Start__c),
LEFT(
Account_Facility__r.Name & " * " & TEXT(Start_Date__c) & " * " & Account_Facility__r.BillingCity & "," & Account_Facility__r.BillingState,80),
LEFT( Account_Facility__r.Name &" * "& TEXT(Date_of_Event_Start__c) &" * "&Account_Facility__r.BillingCity &", "& Account_Facility__r.BillingState,80))
fieldUpdates.name: CMA Record IS Name

fieldUpdates.formula: "Cancelled" & " - " & LEFT( TEXT(VACourseType1__c) & " - " & TEXT( VAProduct1__c ) & " - " & Account_Facility__r.Name & " - " & Department_Unit_Focus_Vetting__c & " "& TEXT(Date_of_Event_Start__c),68)
fieldUpdates.name: IS Name Update - Cancelled Requests

fieldUpdates.literalValue: Needs Assessment Sent - Waiting on Account
fieldUpdates.name: Needs Assessment Sent - Waiting on Acct

fieldUpdates.description: Update IS Name for VA 2019 Record Types
fieldUpdates.name: 2019 VA IS Name Update

rules.description: This rule is intended to Use the standard nomenclature for
rules.formula: AND( (RecordType.Name = "Interventional Education Program"), OR( ISNEW() , ISCHANGED( Program_Type_1__c ) , ISCHANGED( Account_Facility__c ), ISCHANGED ( RecordTypeId ), ISCHANGED( Date_of_Event_Start__c ),ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c, "Approved" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Cancelled")) , OR(Account_Facility__c!= NULL ))

rules.fullName: 2019 VA CEM RCEM Notification after completion
rules.description: This is to assure that Education records are being marked as Education Record after training is complete . 12/18/19 Revised Education Record Removed. Just a notification to assure all is done
This is to assure that Education records are being marked as Education Record after training is complete . Revised 12/18/19 remove 5 day check in and Education Record Satge
This rule is intended to Use the standard nomenclature for

rules.fullName: 2019 VA Sales Rep Notification 5 days after completion
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)

criteriaItems.value: Clinical Sales Program,CMA Program,Clinical Sales Program,CMA Program

rules.description: This is to assure that Education records are being marked as Education Record after training is complete
This rule is intended to Use the standard nomenclature for

rules.fullName: 2020 IA IS Name Update Auto Approved
rules.description: This rule is intended to Use the standard nomenclature for
Anes/EMS Teleflex Academy Notification
Marks the Stage as Cancelled

rules.fullName: DNU - CE - Clinical Educator Email Address

rules.description: Send Laurie Croizer notice if Acct GPO and Education Vetting form GPO is different
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c,"VA"), TEXT(Verified_Account_GPO__c) <> TEXT( Account_Facility__r.Main_GPO__c),NOT( ISPICKVAL(Verified_Account_GPO__c,"")))

rules.fullName: DNU CE - CE Travel No Required

rules.description: This notification goes to Valerie Mueller so that she can set up information in Teleflex Academy (Manually) when EZ-IO Training is scheduled and approved (Live Education or Rep/CEM provided).
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Add_to_Teleflex_Academy__c,"Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c,"VA"), ISPICKVAL( Primary_Product__c,"EZ-IO"), OR( Record_Type_Name__c = "REP/CEM Provided Training", AND ( Record_Type_Name__c = "Live Education Program Request", ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c, "Approved"))))

rules.description: 2023 updates
Notify Valerie Mueller if education that was entered into TFX Academy is cancelled.

rules.fullName: Notify Jen Clinical created an EdRec
Sales Rep update for VA Clinical Sales
Stage to Confirmed from Training Completed
rules.description: Stage to Confirmed from Training Completed
rules.formula: AND( Ending_Date__c > TODAY() , ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Training Completed" ) )

rules.description: Stantardize the record name for CMA lab and CMA speaker requests
rules.formula: AND(OR( RecordType.Name ="CMA Procedural Lab Request",RecordType.Name ="CMA Speaking Engagement Request"), OR( ISNEW() , ISCHANGED(Start_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED( Account_Facility__c ), ISCHANGED( Date_of_Event_Start__c ) ))

rules.description: Stantardize the record name for Education Program Request
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c ,"IA")), OR( Contains(RecordType.Name, "Education"), Contains(RecordType.Name, "Provided Training")) , OR( ISNEW() , ISCHANGED(Primary_Product__c ) , ISCHANGED( Account_Facility__c ), ISCHANGED( Date_of_Event_Start__c )), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Cancelled")) )

rules.fullName: Standardize Education Program Request Name - Respiratory
rules.description: Stantardize the record name for Education Program Request for Respiratory
rules.formula: AND((RecordTypeId="01244000000g5pG"), OR( ISNEW() , ISCHANGED( Account_Facility__c ), ISCHANGED( Date_of_Event_Start__c ) ))

rules.description: SteepRock Approval Status Update

criteriaItems.value: Interventional Education Program,ANES/EMS Education Record,CMA Program,Clinical Sales Program,CMA Procedural Lab Request

rules.formula: AND( NOT(Clinical_Educator__r.RecordType.Name = "TFX - Internal Resource"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Hotel_Requested__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Travel_Type_Requested__c,"Flight"), ISPICKVAL(Travel_Type_Requested__c,"Train"), ISPICKVAL(Car_Request__c,"Car Rental Requested"), ISPICKVAL(Car_Request__c,"Taxi/Public Transportation"), Travel_Time_4_hrs__c = TRUE), ISPICKVAL (Approval_Status__c,"Approved"))

rules.description: Used as a quick fix for Teleflex Academy Emails that need to be sent to be added to Teleflex Academy Calendar.

rules.fullName: VA CMA Clinical Sales Speaker Program has been Marked as Training Complete
rules.description: Email notification CMA Clinical Sales Speaker Program has been Marked as Training Complete

rules.fullName: VA CMA Missing information during approval process
rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR (2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6))) AND 7 AND (8 OR 9 )
rules.description: This is for records that CMA are approving

rules.fullName: VA CMA Notification of Contractor request
VA CS Speaker Program Record Approved by RCSM
VA Edu record Approved with Add to TFX Academy %27Yes%27
rules.description: Sends notification to Valerie with 2022 course type, inserter type, and SteepRock fields used by all BUs

rules.fullName: VA Education Contractor added to training request
rules.formula:
AND( SumofEducationContractors__c > PRIORVALUE(SumofEducationContractors__c),
ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c, "VA"),
RecordType.Name = "Clinical Sales Program"
)

rules.fullName: VA Missing information during approval process
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)
rules.description: This is for clinical sales when CMA is not required

rules.fullName: VA Missing information during approval process for 3 days
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)
rules.description: when in review for more than 3 days

rules.fullName: VA Uncheck Yes for TFA Field
rules.description: This rule is to enforce the inverse of another rule that checks TFA to Yes. which then sends an email to Val to enroll this program for Teleflex academy.
This rule will update teleflex academy needed to yes based off of Pre work fields

tasks.description: The cancellation notification has been sent for Teleflex Academy.
tasks.subject: Cancellation Notifcation
